member.name: M:Budget.HomeBudget.GetBudgetDictionaryByCategoryAndMonth(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Get a list of Dictionaries with information about the total expenses for a given month and category, in addition to the totals for a given month, and the totals for a given category.
Each item in the returned list is a Dictionary (list of string/object pairs), where the string/objects are:
KEYVALUE
Month A string representing the month
Category Name 1 A double representing the total expenditures for this month and category
details:Category Name 1 A list of BudgetItems for this month and category
Category Name 2 A double representing the total expenditures for this month and category
details:Category Name 2 A list of BudgetItems for this month and category
...
Category Name n A double representing the total expenditures for this month and category
details:Category Name n A list of BudgetItems for this month and category
Total A double representing the total expenditures for this month
The last item in the returned list is a Dictionary (list of string/object pairs), where the string/objects are:
KEYVALUE
Month the string 'TOTALS'
Category Name 1 A double representing the total expenditures for this category
Category Name 2 A double representing the total expenditures for this category
... ...
Category Name n A double representing the total expenditures for this category

remarks.para: If Start and End date are null, then they will be set to their defaults

member.exception: If the SQLite file is corrupted in any way

Only expenses that were incurred after or on this date will be processed
default: Jan 1, 1900

Only expenses that were incurred before or on this date will be processed
default: Jan 1, 2500
